Class Worker

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Thread
This class is used as a thread to solve a task.

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker​(int id, int newSimulationTime, java.util.concurrent.Semaphore newSemaphore, Tasks newTasks, java.lang.Boolean newFlag, Writer newWriter)
      Constructs a worker to solve a task, when started the worker take tasks from the tasks pool. The writes the task solutions into a file.
      Parameters:
      id - This workers identification.
      newSimulationTime - Time to be use to give sense of complexity.
      newSemaphore - Semaphore shared, to crontrol the writing into a file between al threads.
      newTasks - A reference to the tasks pool.
      newFlag - A flag indicating when to stop. True as default
      newWriter - A reference to the object able to write into a file.
